title: A Sunrise Train to Somewhere Small

excerpt: The river kept its own slow conversation — lanterns humming as Dorami walked.

title: Dorami: Quiet Before the Games
excerpt: A close-up portrait of Dorami beside the ancient stadium — quiet and steady.

title: Steps After Rain
excerpt: Wet white steps and puddle-mirrors — a short photo essay and a tiny meeting left under an umbrella.

title: A Sunrise Coffee by the Old Harbor
excerpt: Early morning ritual: Dorami and a local barista trade stories over tiny Greek coffees and salt air.

title: Midnight Stroll Past the Lit-Up Ruins
excerpt: Dorami wanders alone after dinner, exploring quiet lanes beneath the Acropolis lights; reflective, small discoveries.

title: Learning to Dance: A Backyard Bouzouki Night
excerpt: Dorami joins a backyard bouzouki night, learning traditional steps and laughing through the awkwardness.

title: Dorami's Warm Dinner in Athens
excerpt: Dorami in a night dress enjoying a warm candlelit dinner with Greek friends.

title: Dorami at the Athens Market
excerpt: Dorami walks through a busy Athens market near the Pantheon, golden-hour light and everyday wonders.

title: Parthenon, Athens
excerpt: Dorami visits the Parthenon in a white summer dress and straw hat, looking left.

title: Ferry to Athens
excerpt: White summer dress, straw hat, and a sea-breeze ferry ride from Santorini to Athens.

title: Cozy Hotel, Quiet Screen
excerpt: Pyjamas, soft warm lighting, and a quiet MacBook moment before sleep.

title: Under the Milky Way
excerpt: A quiet moment under the stars, with the Milky Way arching over the sea.

title: Santorini Sunset at the Seaside Café
excerpt: Golden hour over the Aegean from a seaside café.

title: Hello, Santorini!
excerpt: Dorami wanders through Oia’s cliffside paths — blue domes, Aegean shimmer, and a breezy summer day.
